index.title: Stories & Case Studies
index.author: JJ Hiew
index.description: Stories and case studies of the GetQuorum Platform in action.

electronic-condo-proxies.title: Reaching Quorum With Electronic Proxies

quotes.text: In my six years as a condo manager, this is the first time I’ve ever seen an AGM reach quorum before it was even held.
quotes.author: Wilmer Gomez, RCM

quotes.text: It made reaching quorum so easy. We intend to continue using the electronic proxy for future meetings.
quotes.author: Ed Bezeau, President, MTCC 1371

electronic-condo-proxies.author: JJ Hiew
electronic-condo-proxies.description: A case study showing how we helped a 200 unit condo, one with recurring quorum issues, double the proxy submissions year-to-year and reach requorum days before their latest AGM.

passing-a-bylaw-with-getquorum.title: Passing a Bylaw With The GetQuorum Platform

quotes.text: In my six years as a condo manager, this is the first time I’ve ever seen an AGM reach quorum before it was even held.

quotes.text: It made reaching quorum so easy. We intend to continue using the electronic proxy for future meetings.
quotes.author: Ed Bezeau, President, MTCC 1371

passing-a-bylaw-with-getquorum.author: JJ Hiew
passing-a-bylaw-with-getquorum.description: A case study about how we helped a 300-unit condo pass a critical bylaw with the GetQuorum platform.
